content.html: Let’s say you’re assaulted by your new boyfriend. You get a restraining order and he’s convicted of domestic violence. Because you two weren’t married or living together, federal law says he can go buy a gun the next day. That’s the boyfriend loophole, and we need to close it.
content.value:
Let’s say you’re assaulted by your new boyfriend. You get a restraining order and he’s convicted of domestic violence. 

Because you two weren’t married or living together, federal law says he can go buy a gun the next day.

That’s the boyfriend loophole, and we need to close it.
